message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,400,000.  It's a fantastic deal for both of us.  Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and pay $1,300,000. Can you consider this offer?

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $1,300,000 is still a bit low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $1,350,000.  This is a fair price for both of us, and I'm confident this product will be a valuable asset to your business. Let's make this deal happen!

I understand your concerns, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $1,325,000. This is the highest I can go, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
